languages.text: Using {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g}.
languages.original_text: Активация Осторожного подхода также дает архмилитанту {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное 10% от его {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Также это происходит в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, когда на архмилитанта действует эффект Осторожный подход.

traits.locale_text: Using the Cautios Approach also grants the Veteran temporary wounds equal to 10% of the Veteran's maximum wounds. The same happens at the start of every turn while the Veteran remains under the effect of Cautios Approach.

Using Cautious Approach also grants the Veteran temporary wounds equal to 10% of the Veteran's maximum wounds. The same happens at the start of every turn while the Veteran remains under the effect of Cautious Approach.

Using Cautious Approach also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of Cautious Approach.

Using Cautious Approach also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of Cautious Approach.

languages.text: 使用{g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}步步为营{/g}还会使首席战士获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。当首席战士处于{g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}步步为营{/g}效果中时，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始都会触发此效果。
languages.original_text: Using {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用步步为营还会使老兵获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。当老兵处于{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}步步为营{/g}效果中时，每回合开始都会触发此效果。

languages.text: Usar {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Enfoque cauteloso{/g} también proporciona al Archimilitante {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} por valor del 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del Archimilitante. Este efecto se repite al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} mientras el Archimilitante se beneficie de los efectos de {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Enfoque cauteloso{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Usar Enfoque cauteloso también proporciona al Archimilitante {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} por valor del 10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del Archimilitante. Este efecto se repite al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} mientras el Archimilitante se beneficie de los efectos de Enfoque cauteloso.

languages.text: 警戒接近を使用すると、アーク・ミリタントの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の10%に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が付与される。警戒接近の効果が発動中の間は、毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に同じ効果が発動する。
languages.original_text: Using Cautious Approach also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of Cautious Approach.

traits.locale_text: 警戒接近を使用すると、アーク・ミリタントの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の10%に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が付与される。警戒接近の効果が発動中の間は、毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に同じ効果が発動する。

languages.text: Активация {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Осторожного подхода{/g} также дает архмилитанту {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное 10% от его {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Также это происходит в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, когда на архмилитанта действует эффект {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Осторожный подход{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Активация {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Осторожного подхода{/g} также дает архмилитанту {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное 10% от его {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Также это происходит в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, когда на архмилитанта действует эффект {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Осторожный подход{/g}.

Активация Осторожного подхода также дает ветерану {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное 10% от его {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Также это происходит в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, когда на ветерана действует эффект Осторожный подход.

languages.text: Die Nutzung von {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Vorsichtiges Vorgehen{/g} gewährt dem Erzmilitanten außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}, die 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} entsprechen. Dasselbe geschieht zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}, während der Erzmilitant unter dem Effekt von {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Vorsichtiges Vorgehen{/g} steht.
languages.original_text: Using {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Nutzung von Vorsichtiges Vorgehen gewährt dem Erzmilitanten außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}, die 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} entsprechen. Dasselbe geschieht zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}, während der Erzmilitant unter dem Effekt von Vorsichtiges Vorgehen steht.

languages.text: L'utilisation d'{g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Approche prudente{/g} confère également à l'archimilitant un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à 10 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Cela se reproduit au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} tant que l'archimilitant est sous l'effet d'{g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Approche prudente{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation d'Approche Prudente confère également au Vétéran un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à 10 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Cela se reproduit au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} tant que le Vétéran est sous l'effet d'Approche Prudente.

languages.text: {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Temkinli Yaklaşım{/g} kullanmak ayrıca Başmilitan'a {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} kazandırır. Aynı durum, Başmilitan {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Temkinli Yaklaşım{/g} etkisi altında olduğu müddetçe her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başında gerçekleşir.
languages.original_text: Using {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g} also grants the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 10% of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The same happens at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} while the Arch-Militant remains under the effect of {g|f:b75d2649f75f4262975138d739bf822e}Cautious Approach{/g}.
